NewsDetail.Title: Enhancements to myBYUI
NewsDetail.subTitle: Enhancements to myBYUI make it more applicable to user
NewsDetail.Abstract: Starting May 2, you'll see something new to my.byui page. You will have a new home tab containing links and messages designed to be more applicable to you.
NewsDetail.Author: University Communications
NewsDetail.BodyCopy:
New location for "Favorite Links"

Because we have made some changes to the tabs on myBYUI, you may be having a hard time finding your "Favorite Links". To find your "Favorite Links" please follow the steps below:

1.Click on "PROFILE"

2. Look at the bottom of the page under "Go to Main Screen"

Enhancements to myBYUI

When you log into myBYUIon Tuesday May 2 you'll see something new! You will have a new home tab containing links and messages designed to be more applicable to you. Commonly used links are categorized in the left navigation. Each category can be expanded with the MORE button to reveal other subcategories of links to helpful online services and offices. Of course you still have your personalized tabs at the top that let you check things like your email, I-Learn courses or account balance.
Based on your interaction with the university you will be placed in one of five groups. If you belong to multiple groups you will be able to toggle between them.

The groups are:

• Students

• Faculty

• Employees

• Online Students

• Online Adjunct Faculty
